result.title: Technex '18, IIT (BHU) AI Simulation Challenge
result.content:
Hello Codeforces Community,

Technex '18 brings to you an array of events to tap into the domains of supercomputing and scientific simulation on the cloud platform provided by Kogence.

With prizes worth $35,000 and exciting internships at stake, powered by Amazon Web Services, VMware and Nvidia. Don't miss this opportunity to perform simulations on Artificial Intelligence, Meta-Materials and Photonics. So, it’s time for you to acuminate your aptitude, and imitate some intriguing and intricate real-world processes throughout the events! Follow these simple steps to indulge yourself in the world of Supercomputing:

  1. Sign Up on Kogence — https://kogence.com/app
  2. Register for the challenge at — https://kogence.com/app/landing/challenges starting from November 1, 2017.
